languages.text: "Школько можно терпеть? Этот новичок-ублюдок Коннага прикончил! Прирежем его, шкажем, это жаклющенные шделали".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Нащальник, говоришь? Этот ублюдок Щедого прикончил! Уроем его, шкажем, жаклющенные прирежали".

languages.text: "How mush more of thish can we take? That newcomer bashtard killed Connag! Let'sh kill him, we'll shay the prishoners did it."
languages.original_text: "Школько можно терпеть? Этот новичок-ублюдок Коннага прикончил! Прирежем его, шкажем, это жаклющенные шделали".

traits.locale_text: "How mush more of thish can we take? That newcomer bashtard killed Connag! Let'sh kill him, we'll shay the prishoners did it."
"How mush more of thish can we take? That newcomer bashtard killed Connag! Let'sh kill him, we'll shay the prishoners did it."
"How mush more of thish can we take? That newcomer bashtard killed Connag! Let'sh kill him, we'll shay the prishoners did it."
"How mush more of thish can we take? That newcomer bashtard killed Connag! Let'sh kill him, we'll shay the prishoners did it."
"How mush more of thish can we take? That newcomer bashtard killed Connag! Let'sh kill him, we'll shay the prishoners did it."

languages.text: "Wie viel mehr können wir noch ertragen? Der neue Bastard hat Connag getötet! Wir töten ihn und sagen, die Häftlinge wären's gewesen."
languages.original_text: "How mush more of thish can we take? That newcomer bashtard killed Connag! Let'sh kill him, we'll shay the prishoners did it."

traits.locale_text: "Wie viel mehr können wir noch ertragen? Der neue Bastard hat Connag getötet! Wir töten ihn und sagen, die Häftlinge wären's gewesen."

languages.text: « Cha commenche à bien faire ! Chette ordure a tué Connag ! Tuons-le ! On aura qu'à dire que ch'était les prijonniers. »
languages.original_text: "How mush more of thish can we take? That newcomer bashtard killed Connag! Let'sh kill him, we'll shay the prishoners did it."

traits.locale_text: « Cha commenche à bien faire ! Chette ordure a tué Connag ! Tuons-le ! On aura qu'à dire que ch'était les prijonniers. »

languages.text: “这种操蛋日子到底要过到什么时候？那个新来的狗崽子杀了康纳！我们不如弄死他，把黑锅甩到那些罪犯身上。”
languages.original_text: "How mush more of thish can we take? That newcomer bashtard killed Connag! Let'sh kill him, we'll shay the prishoners did it."

traits.locale_text: “这种操蛋日子到底要过到什么时候？那个新来的狗崽子杀了康纳！我们不如弄死他，把黑锅甩到那些罪犯身上。”

languages.text: «¿Qué másh vamosh a tolerar? ¡El deshgraciado del recién llegado ha matado a Connag! Vamosh a matarle noshotrosh; diremosh que han shido losh reclushosh».
languages.original_text: "How mush more of thish can we take? That newcomer bashtard killed Connag! Let'sh kill him, we'll shay the prishoners did it."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué másh vamosh a tolerar? ¡El deshgraciado del recién llegado ha matado a Connag! Vamosh a matarle noshotrosh; diremosh que han shido losh reclushosh».

languages.text: 「これ以上こんなこと、どれだけ耐えられるってんだ？あの新入りの野郎、コナグを殺しやがった！こいつをぶっ殺そう。囚人どもがやったってことにすりゃあいい」
languages.original_text: "How mush more of thish can we take? That newcomer bashtard killed Connag! Let'sh kill him, we'll shay the prishoners did it."

traits.locale_text: 「これ以上こんなこと、どれだけ耐えられるってんだ？あの新入りの野郎、コナグを殺しやがった！こいつをぶっ殺そう。囚人どもがやったってことにすりゃあいい」

languages.text: "Buna daha ne kadar kadlanacağıs? O yeni yedme şerefsis, Connag'ı öldürmedi mi? Bis de onu öldürelim, mahkûmlar yapdı deris."
languages.original_text: "How mush more of thish can we take? That newcomer bashtard killed Connag! Let'sh kill him, we'll shay the prishoners did it."

traits.locale_text: "Buna daha ne kadar kadlanacağıs? O yeni yedme şerefsis, Connag'ı öldürmedi mi? Bis de onu öldürelim, mahkûmlar yapdı deris."
